remarks.p:
This rule merely passes on the value of
default_value when invoked. However, it also tags its target with the "config" tag, so that the user will be prompted to set the value of the target if he or she runs a configuration program. You should add a "prompt" tag to your target that quickly explains what effect the configuration target has on the build.
Note that the type InstallDirectory is a subclass of MBString, not MBDirectory.
